Gareth Bale Pamit dari Real Madrid di Januari 2020?
05 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rumor kepindahan Gareth Bale dari Real Madrid nampaknya semakin mendekati kenyataan. Sang winger diberitakan sudah minta ijin untuk meninggalkan Santiago Bernabeu di bulan Januari nanti.
Sejak musim panas kemarin, ada situasi yang kompleks mengenai masa depan Bale. Pada saat itu ia nyaris pindah dari Real Madrid setelah Zinedine Zidane mengatakan bahwa ia tidak membutuhkan sang winger.
Namun beberapa waktu berselang, Zidane mengubah pikirannya. Ia memutuskan untuk mempertahankan Bale, setelah sejumlah pemain utamanya mengalami cedera.
Namun Cadena SER mengatakan bahwa Bale masih memendam hasrat meninggalkan Real Madrid. Ia diberitakan ingin meninggalkan raksasa Spanyol itu di bulan Januari nanti.

Apa yang menyebabkan Bale ingin pindah dari Madrid? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.

Gareth Bale Farewell from Real Madrid in January 2020?
05 Nov 2019, 16:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rumors of Gareth Bale's move from Real Madrid seem closer to reality. The winger was reported to have asked permission to leave the Santiago Bernabeu in January.
Since last summer, there have been complex situations regarding the future of Bale. At that time he almost moved from Real Madrid after Zinedine Zidane said that he did not need the winger.
But some time later, Zidane changed his mind. He decided to keep Bale, after a number of his main players suffered injuries.
But Cadena SER said that Bale still harbored a desire to leave Real Madrid. He reportedly wanted to leave the Spanish giant in January.
